title: Personal Cell Creator
description: Fill in the necessary information to create a new cell.

cell_info.title: Cell
cell_info.description: Enter a name and select which cell type is to be created.

cell_name.label: Cell Name <small data-i18n='label.required'></small>
cell_name.spec: Must be 128 characters or less and start with alphanumeric and the rest contains alphanumeric, underscores or hyphens.

tooltips.Organization: A cell for data consumer or provider

admin_name.label: Account Name  <small data-i18n='label.required'></small>
admin_name.placeholder: Name of the new admin account
admin_name.spec: Please do not use unsupported symbol(s).

password.label: Password  <small data-i18n='label.required'></small>
password.spec: Must be 6 - 32 characters and contains alphanumeric, underscores or hyphens.
